item.title: How to Plot Geo Map using MapBox and Plotly (FREE) - BEGINNER-FRIENDLY
item.description: Ever wonder how to create a customized and interactive geographical map using Python (for free)? You’ve come to the right place! This is a simple tutorial on how to set up MapBox and Plotly to visualise map data. At the end of this tutorial, you will be creating your first map that looks like this ðŸ‘‡ Notes This article is written based on my coding experience in Google Collab, so there might be some part which is irrelevant to those using Python in your local computer.
